headline: Steel Dynamics, Inc. (STLD): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Steel Dynamics, Inc. on Stock Picker’s Journey’s Substack by Gregg Jahnke. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on STLD. Steel Dynamics, Inc. ‘s share was trading at $127.56 as of July 31st. STLD’s trailing and forward P/E were 18.51 and 14.29 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Steel […]
